subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fernando Torres scored twice in the last two minutes and Liverpool defeated Chelsea, 2-0, cutting Manchester United’s lead in the English Premier League to 2 points. In Italy, David Beckham set up two goals, as A.C. Milan beat Lazio, 3-0, to take second place in Serie A, 6 points behind Inter Milan.
